Package org.resthub.tapestry5.jpa.services

Provides resthub services and configurations for Tapestry5 and jpa integration in a "resthub way"

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DirectJPAEntityManagerSourceImpl
    Define a service providing direct integration between a JPA entity manager and Tapestry5 ioc and persistence services.
    ResthubJPAModule
    Provide configuration for Tapestry5 resthub jpa module : contributions of services, behaviours, configuration parameters, libraries, etc.
